title: Motor Trend SpillGuard Waterproof Seat Cover, Gray Stitching – Split Bench Rear Seat Protector with Neoprene Padding, for Kids & Dogs, Car Interior Covers
description: SpillGuard Waterproof Rear Seat Protector, Gray Stitching – Universal Fit Neoprene Foam Bench Cover with Extended Side Coverage for Car, Truck, Van, and SUV. Universal fit design for pick-up trucks, hatchback sedans and most other types of car, truck, van & SUV. Also works great as a baby, pet, or dog seat cover. Perfect car accessories for rideshare drivers too!
